page.title: 09LIFE IN DEPDEN - BEFORE 10AM
page.content: 7.10 Alarm - get up 7.15 Start breakfast 7.30 Breakfast finished. Start packed lunches for three oldest children and find lost school things and remind boys of time 8.00 Boys catch school bus 8.05 Wash-up, husband leaves for work 8.15 Jog round Green approx. 1/2 mile 8.25 Home - shower and wash hair 8.40 Organise Sallyanne for school and Roy for playschool. Make 5 beds 9.00 Walk Sallyanne to catch bus 9.05 - 9.20 Depending when bus arrives 9.25 Return home gather Roy's things and go to playschool 9.27 Drive to playschool collecting Emma-Rose and Melanie (no car) 9.35 Arrive at Chevington playschool 10.00 Leave playschool, call at Post Office for Family Allowance. Rush into Bury to Supermarket
